packagegui.title: Firewall: IPguard

menu.name: IPguard
menu.tooltiptext: Tool designed to protect LAN IP address space by ARP spoofing.

adddeleteeditpagefields.description:
If firewall receives traffic with MAC/IP pair not listed here, it will send ARP reply with configured fake address.
This will prevent not permitted host from working properly in the specified ethernet segment.

field.description:
Enable this MAC rule.
Important Note: Always create rules for pfSense MAC and IP address to avoid denying access to pfFense GUI!
The interface on which IPguard server will check this MAC.

Insert MAC address you want to filter.
To include a permit rule, use MAC 00:00:00:00:00:00

Insert IP address, hostname or network CIDR you want to apply on this IPguard rule.
To include a permit rule, use your LAN CIDR or 0.0.0.0
